messages.message:
Hi everyone :wave:

If you’ve used Admiral to update a sandbox in the past couple months you might have noticed a new checkbox under Advanced Options labelled “Skip deploying Control Plane”. We strongly encourage all users, unless directly involved with Control Plane work, to select this checkbox. By doing so, you can save ~15 minutes in the pipeline, as re-deploying Control Plane is typically unnecessary for the majority of sandboxes.
If you’ve already tried out this feature, you might’ve seen that it was broken and didn’t do anything, but we’re happy to announce that it’s fixed and fully functional.
Should we also check this by default :laughing:
That’s a good point, I’ll run it by the team
Alternatively change the checkbox so that selecting it deploys Control Plane (and leave it unchecked by default)

thank you @William Helmrath for fixing this. I have tried skipping but didn't work earlier. I strongly agree to check it by default because most of the deployments doesn't involve the DM so they could get faster deployment.
